alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 20 at 12:49AM EST until November 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 19 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Cayuga county. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4352 7536 4359 7564 4367 7623 4355 7625 4356 7643 4338 7677 4325 7640 4318 7587 4340 7586 4342 7550 TIME Y22M11D20T1800Z-Y22M11D21T0900Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
